item.title: First C++ Program
item.description: When running a C++ program the computer always looks for and runs a function called main. int main() { } A function in C++ is formatted in a similar way than to Java or Kotlin! First we have the return type, in this case it is an integer or int. Then we have the name of the function, in this case main. After the name are any parameters the function takes in, in this case none.
